channel.title: DeltaScape
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://puu.sh/a5O9w/6810206d19.png[/img][/CENTER] [spoiler="DeltaScape the beginning year 2007"]
Delta: "I was in a skilling clan on RuneScape, and people would post fake pictures on there with like 50 partyhat sets. Everyone responded "must be mopar." I searched mopar on the forums and I found a thread by the co-owner of the forums. I decided to try it out. That is how I got into mopar. While playing RuneScape as a f2per, I see a delta airline add. I decide to make my username on mopar "Delta1." Started servers when the only servers that existed was the servers you can only spawn on. The servers did not contain combat or anything unique yet. Started playing random servers I found on Sythe, and I decided to make my own. As soon as I progressed, my name was changed to 'Delta."'
[/spoiler] [spoiler="July 18, 2009 - Fally"]
Delta: "Server still steady at a massive 600+ players online daily." "PKing is a big hit for the server everyone PKed." "I started seeing lots of PK videos of DeltaScape on youtube." "I think DeltaScape was then famous."
[/spoiler] [spoiler="September 20, 2009, 11:45AM - 450 Player Milestone goal - Entrana"]
Delta: "We completed our goal in a min." "453 players!" "Fastest growing server."
[/spoiler] DeltaScape returns. DeltaScape died in late 2010 (technically), now 4 years later, it will return. Returning with all rewritten content, using the Hyperion framework developed by Graham, keeping focused on making the content nearly flawless, there is no doubt DeltaScape will succeed yet again. [b]The Team[/b] Kyle - Server administration, community management, global developer Mike - Community management, global developer [CENTER][IMG]http://puu.sh/a2JoB/55f5b22e3e.png[/img][/CENTER] [b]Legend[/b] [ul][*][COLOR=#65de3a]Complete[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=maroon]Not done / not started[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#e3e514]Work in progress[/COLOR][/ul] [COLOR=#d8ccaf] [ul][*][COLOR=#e3e514]Character appearance changing[/COLOR] [list] [*][COLOR=#e3e514]Make-over mage[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#e3e514]Hairdresser[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=maroon]Thessalia[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=maroon]Beard make overs[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=maroon]Feet appearance[/COLOR] [/list] [*][COLOR=#e3e514]Skill requirement menus[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#e3e514]Entity (NPC & Player) following[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#e3e514](Double) Doors[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#e3e514]Gates[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#65de3a]Dialogue handling[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#e3e514]Teleportation items[/COLOR] [list] [*][COLOR=#e3e514]Amulet of glory[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#e3e514]Ring of duelling[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#e3e514]Games necklace[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#e3e514]Skills necklace[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#e3e514]Combat bracelet[/COLOR] [/list] [*][COLOR=#e3e514]Pets[/COLOR] [list] [*][COLOR=#e3e514]Kittens / cats[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#e3e514]Feeding[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=maroon]Caring[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=maroon]Growing[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=maroon]Neglecting[/COLOR] [/list][/ul] [/spoiler] We're currently looking for a client developer. Some notes before-hand: [ul][*]You will be given the full credits for all of your work, and will be an official developer. [*]The development team uses GitHub, with a git repo. Having experience with git is highly necessary. [*]You will only be given access to the repository for the client, you will not receive access to the server repository. [*]If the day ever comes when we require another server developer, and you should apply for it, as a developer, you will have higher priority over others. [*]We're looking for a developer that can provide us with exceeding client work.[/ul] Interested? Send a PM with the following: [CODE] Name: Previous Projects: Any links leading to your projects: Country: Programming languages: Do you document your work?: Do you have experience with 317 clients?: Do you have experience with git?: Your expectations: Have you heard of DeltaScape before?: If so, have you played, and when did you play?: Are you okay with constructive criticism?: Any links leading to your assisting of others: [/CODE] Providing you're still interested when the time comes, I'll contact you back, or let you know if anything else should happen. [CENTER][IMG]http://puu.sh/a2MmQ/ce83339d40.png[/img][/CENTER] [spoiler="Random Videos"] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6cvdb5vob8M[/youtube] [/spoiler] [spoiler="Combat"] [img]http://i.imgur.com/pJ2ZQEh.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/wV4dTfl.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/yfSfPCO.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/aDtV7Ui.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/xONAlOL.png[/img] [/spoiler] [spoiler="Skills"] [img]http://i.imgur.com/c9x6KCW.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/tXnwGq7.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ADp1BrW.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/VaS2fAJ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1wVHDzP.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ByZXsDs.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8ytkIHB.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/istDPSF.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZPjRj3J.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/xdxsSUR.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OfBXp8n.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/i0Xgwj8.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ShQW60J.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/sZkW7M7.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/83F4Db9.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/BEoQn8Q.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Nh3d0rX.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5PPI5Ko.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/siHANhR.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/dEoleNq.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/kOy0TMT.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/euypXL4.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NduP5w4.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/7OLv3zS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/pkJ4EQc.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/2WF8HKA.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ezV3T4n.png[/img] [/spoiler]

item.title: DeltaScape
item.dc:creator: @FrozenAge FrozenAge
item.description:
@FrozenAge wrote:

[quote=“lare69, post:11, topic:544836”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=663713.msg4436209#msg4436209 date=1405130699]
using bars on anvils to get coins wasn’t was fun.
Also what’s the point in ‘bringing delta back’ when it’s not going to be delta, if you are going to change stuff
[/quote]
fixed[/quote]

Thanks lare, we’re not trying to ‘change’ as much as you expect, but make it better. Towards that; we’re going to make things more… Sophisticated. If the community demands otherwise, we’ll try to accommodate.

I get that using bars on anvils to get coins may of had seem “fun”, but for more to do, I think Smithing should be more related to how RuneScape had it.

Again, when I first started working on the server with a blank Hyperion source, other than the work I put into it, the content’s aspects were put in as a traditional standard. If that makes any sense.

Also, with an edit;
DeltaScape was changed majorly through the years, as it’s 2014, we want things to be greater, as we’ve been around DeltaScape for a while though, it’'s not as much as we want, it’s what the players want, which is why we’re going to be doing what we’re doing.

Read full topic

item.title: DeltaScape
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:10, topic:544836”]using bars on anvils to get coins wasn’t was fun.
Also what’s the point in ‘bringing delta back’ when it’s not going to be delta, if you are going to change stuff[/quote]
fixed

Read full topic

item.title: DeltaScape
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“FrozenAge, post:8, topic:544836”][quote author=Dan0194 link=topic=663713.msg4435889#msg4435889 date=1405053149]

Is the server online?

Not publicly. It’s still in alpha.

wait is this a hyperion(trying to make it feel like a deltascape) or a delta server?
[/quote]

Hyperion, we have the last backup of the original server before DeltaScape died, no code is going to be used from the original source of course, but the ideas (that are sufficient enough) will be used.

Basically, we’ll maintain what DeltaScape was, but also change simple things, like Smithing, using bars on anvils to get coins wasn’t too much fun.[/quote]
using bars on anvils to get coins wasn’t was fun.
Also what’s the point in ‘bringing delta back’ when it’s not going to be delta, if you are going to change stuff

Read full topic

Basically, we’ll maintain what DeltaScape was, but also change simple things, like Smithing, using bars on anvils to get coins wasn’t too much fun.[/quote]

Ooo that’s pretty cool good luck

item.title: DeltaScape
item.dc:creator: @FrozenAge FrozenAge
item.description:
@FrozenAge wrote:

[quote=“Dan0194, post:7, topic:544836”][quote author=FrozenAge link=topic=663713.msg4435887#msg4435887 date=1405052842]

Is the server online?

Not publicly. It’s still in alpha.
[/quote]

wait is this a hyperion(trying to make it feel like a deltascape) or a delta server?[/quote]

Hyperion, we have the last backup of the original server before DeltaScape died, no code is going to be used from the original source of course, but the ideas (that are sufficient enough) will be used.

Basically, we’ll maintain what DeltaScape was, but also change simple things, like Smithing, using bars on anvils to get coins wasn’t too much fun.

Read full topic

item.title: DeltaScape
item.dc:creator: @Driman_Rune Driman Rune
item.description:
@Driman_Rune wrote:

[quote=“FrozenAge, post:1, topic:544836”][CENTER][/CENTER]

[spoiler=“DeltaScape the beginning year 2007”]

Delta: “I was in a skilling clan on RuneScape, and people would post fake pictures on there with like 50 partyhat sets. Everyone responded “must be mopar.” I searched mopar on the forums and I found a thread by the co-owner of the forums. I decided to try it out. That is how I got into mopar. While playing RuneScape as a f2per, I see a delta airline add. I decide to make my username on mopar “Delta1.” Started servers when the only servers that existed was the servers you can only spawn on. The servers did not contain combat or anything unique yet. Started playing random servers I found on Sythe, and I decided to make my own. As soon as I progressed, my name was changed to 'Delta.”’

[/spoiler]

[spoiler=“July 18, 2009 - Fally”]

Delta: “Server still steady at a massive 600+ players online daily.” “PKing is a big hit for the server everyone PKed.” “I started seeing lots of PK videos of DeltaScape on youtube.” “I think DeltaScape was then famous.”

[/spoiler]

[spoiler=“September 20, 2009, 11:45AM - 450 Player Milestone goal - Entrana”]

Delta: “We completed our goal in a min.” “453 players!” “Fastest growing server.”

[/spoiler][/quote]

I’ve… been… touched. Such shock how Delta came to be. xD

OT: Goodluck, love the project thread layout.

Read full topic

item.title: DeltaScape
item.dc:creator: @FrozenAge FrozenAge
item.description:
@FrozenAge wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]

[spoiler=“DeltaScape the beginning year 2007”]

Delta: "I was in a skilling clan on RuneScape, and people would post fake pictures on there with like 50 partyhat sets. Everyone responded "must be mopar." I searched mopar on the forums and I found a thread by the co-owner of the forums. I decided to try it out. That is how I got into mopar. While playing RuneScape as a f2per, I see a delta airline add. I decide to make my username on mopar "Delta1." Started servers when the only servers that existed was the servers you can only spawn on. The servers did not contain combat or anything unique yet. Started playing random servers I found on Sythe, and I decided to make my own. As soon as I progressed, my name was changed to 'Delta."'
[/spoiler]

[spoiler=“July 18, 2009 - Fally”]

Delta: "Server still steady at a massive 600+ players online daily." "PKing is a big hit for the server everyone PKed." "I started seeing lots of PK videos of DeltaScape on youtube." "I think DeltaScape was then famous."
[/spoiler]

[spoiler=“September 20, 2009, 11:45AM - 450 Player Milestone goal - Entrana”]

Delta: "We completed our goal in a min." "453 players!" "Fastest growing server."
[/spoiler]

DeltaScape returns.

DeltaScape died in late 2010 (technically), now 4 years later, it will return.

Returning with all rewritten content, using the Hyperion framework developed by Graham, keeping focused on making the content nearly flawless, there is no doubt DeltaScape will succeed yet again.

The Team
Kyle - Server administration, community management, global developer
Mike - Community management, global developer

[CENTER][/CENTER]

We’re currently looking for a client developer.

Some notes before-hand:

[ul][]You will be given the full credits for all of your work, and will be an official developer.
[]The development team uses GitHub, with a git repo. Having experience with git is highly necessary.
[]You will only be given access to the repository for the client, you will not receive access to the server repository.
[]If the day ever comes when we require another server developer, and you should apply for it, as a developer, you will have higher priority over others.
[*]We’re looking for a developer that can provide us with exceeding client work.[/ul]

Interested? Send a PM with the following:

Name: Previous Projects: Any links leading to your projects: Country: Programming languages: Do you document your work?: Do you have experience with 317 clients?: Do you have experience with git?: Your expectations: Have you heard of DeltaScape before?: If so, have you played, and when did you play?: Are you okay with constructive criticism?: Any links leading to your assisting of others:

Providing you’re still interested when the time comes, I’ll contact you back, or let you know if anything else should happen.

[CENTER][/CENTER]

[spoiler=“Random Videos”]
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6cvdb5vob8M[/youtube]
[/spoiler]

[/spoiler]

[spoiler=“Skills”]



























[/spoiler]

Read full topic
